title: Smartarget Telegram - Contact Us
shortDescription: Allow customers to contact you using Telegram
longDescription:
If you use Telegram - you can allow your visitors to  approach you via Telegram in one click.

With 'Telegram - Contact Us' you can add a small icon on one of your website corners (any of them!) with your a short message as "Contact us" or "message us" etc. 
When user click on the icon - new tab will open wiith the Telegram chat so users can talk with you right away.
author: TopSoft UG

products.title: Free
products.shortDescription: Limited features. Visible on homepage only.

products.title: Free Plus
products.shortDescription: No limitations. Visible on all pages. Still FREE!

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

üëç Ribbon corner - Promote special offers in one click

üëç Exit popup - Show users special offer before they leave your website

üëç And more...
